District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for Cathlab Technician Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 12:24 IST
 District Health Society
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 25,000 to 35,000




FOLLOW

The District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Cathlab Technician Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma can apply for the District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process,  application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, Candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacanices	Education
Cathlab Technician	01	Diploma

District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 25,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 35,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the District Civil Hospital Ahilyanagar Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Carry all the required documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

District Surgeon’s Office, Ahilyanagar.

Important Dates:

Starting date	06-08-2025
Closing date	12-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
